mainSequence.step: Alice adds a new edge agent.
Edge Agent 2 provides instructions to Alice for adding Agent 2 and selecting authorizations.
Alice adds the agent with the selected authorizations.
Edge Agent 1 displays the provisioning code for adding Agent 2.
Alice shows the code to Edge Agent 2, who scans it.
Edge Agent 2 sends the add request, including authentication and validation keys.
Edge Agent 1 stores the validation key of Agent 2 in the wallet.
Edge Agent 1 confirms the addition of Agent 2.
Agent 1 adds keys and authorizations for Agent 2 to the policy registry.
Edge Agent 2 receives and stores data in the wallet from Agent 1.
